metadata.title: CVE-2023-45229 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: EDK2's Network Package is susceptible to an out-of-bounds readvulnerability when processing the IA_NA or IA_TA option in a DHCPv6Advertise message. This vulnerability can be exploited by an attacker togain unauthorized access and potentially lead to a loss of Confidentiality.

criterions.comment: edk2 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
